```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
cocanada <- read.csv("C:/Users/faria/Desktop/INF2178/poster presentation/covidcanada.csv")
couscounty <-read.csv("C:/Users/faria/Desktop/INF2178/poster presentation/coviduscounties0330.csv")

```

```{r vancouver canada}
vancan <- cocanada %>%
  select(case_id,age,sex,health_region,date_report, travel_yn, travel_history_country,locally_acquired)%>%
  filter(health_region=="Vancouver Coastal")

```
```{r seattle USA}
target <- c("Snohomish", "King", "Pierce")
seausa <- couscounty %>%
  select(-fips)%>%
  filter(county %in% target)

```
